birthday_messages:
🎉 Happy Birthday, {name}! 🎉

Aaj ka din sirf aur sirf aapke liye hai. 🌟 Har pal khushiyon se bhara ho aur saare sapne sach ho. Cake khaaiye, celebrate kariye aur wo logon ke saath waqt bitaaiye jo aapko sabse zyada cherish karte hain. 🎂🎈

Is saal aapke liye naye adventures aur khoobsurat yaadein lekar aaye. Har din ek nayi shuruwaat ho aur zindagi hamesha muskaan se bhari rahe. 💖
Dua hai ki aap hamesha aise hi chamakte rahein aur duniya ki har khushi aapke kadmon mein ho! 🎊

Enjoy your day to the fullest! 🥳
